name: Super Jaywalker
description:
A game created for Game a Week 2023. My theme was: RED

This is an endless runner walker where you have to dodge cars and maximise your time spent jaywalking. Don't stay still because you'll lost points! Comment your points below. I got 2029.

Also let me know how you think it could be improved. This is far from the vision I had but due to scope I cut a lot. I have some ideas but would love some thoughts.

CREDITS:

Made by Max Kearney

Assets used:

https://opengameart.org/content/low-poly-american-muscle-car

https://quaternius.com/packs/animatedwomen.html

https://ambientcg.com/

https://railgallery.wongm.com/melbourne-trams-cbd-and-docklands/F109_8188.jpg.html
